title: Space Engineers v01.008.008 (Portable)
description:
Space Engineers v01.008.008 [Portable Steam Rip] 

Two step run process.
1. Extract using 7zip, WinRar or an archiver of the same variety.
2. Run 

* No Installation
* No Crack
* No Steam
* No Hassle 

You need to have .NET Framework 4.0 installed. Link below. <a href="
http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=17718" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=17718</a>

Seed for others once your download completes; it makes everyone's lives more beautiful.

Support the devs if you enjoyed!

Notes

* Direct Steam Rip. All content (excluding the .NET Framework 4.0, DotNet 4.0 and the 2010/2012 vcredist Redistributables) is included.
* Read the included Readme file 
* The Steam Workshop is Disabled (attempting to load it will crash the game)
* Portable Release (can be stored and played on a memory device)



Space Engineers v01.008.008
Build: 2013-11-29 04:28

Update 01.008.008

We have made some minor additions to yesterdayÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s update:

Feature

Beacons can now be named

Fixes

fixed crash when setting controls
fixed crash when using ladder
fixed ladder movement
fixed asteroid rendering issue
fixed start-up crash after removing second display
fixed character on ladder with drill

~~~01.008.004 Update Changelog~~~

Update 01.008.004 has been released. We have enabled the drill for small ships and astronaut. The drill can be used for harvesting ore from asteroids.

New features

Ship drill enabled
Hand drill enabled
You can now bind two keys to one action
Enabled terminal on more types of blocks

Fixes

Fixed black screen on startup
Fixed disappearing asteroid parts
Fixed minor control issues
Fixed minor GUI issues
